item.title: FBI brochure regarding the rights of victims of financial crimes
item.description: Financial Crime and You (brochure from the FBI, 2018) (source: FBI.gov). Click on this link to visualize the original document: vsd-financial-crime-and-you-brochure-2018.pdf “How Will I Obtain Information? Federal crime victims have a number of rights dur- ing their participation in the criminal justice system, including the right to limited information about the status of the case.” “Some victims have losses so severe that they are unable to meet current financial obligations.” “Many victims feel anger, resentment, frustration, shame, embarrassment, and guilt, as well as fear for financial security and personal safety.
